p: In Mexico, from 2000 to 2015, the C. odorata forest plantations that were recognized and financially supported by CONAFOR covered an area of 200.9 km 2 in 6,271 different polygons. After superimposing these on the current potential distribution map, we found that the potential distribution of C. odorata from this study has a very good match with 95% of them (5,993 polygons) spanning an area of 195.3 km 2.
